ovdesc.p: During private client onboarding process,Investment proposal report will be given to the new client.Investment proposal report contains the recommended investment program and asset allocation graphs that match the risk profile of the client.This application helps in attaching the model portfolio and investment program to the MIFID risk profiles so that the model portfolio and asset allocation graphs can be shown to the new clients.
